name: Meowtropolis
description:
Spark the proletariat uprising of Meowtropolis by recruiting and guiding its citizenry. Collaborate with the head cats to revolt against the boss cat! 

CONTROLS 

[W] [A] [S] [D] to move 

[E] to interact 

[Left Mouse Button] to direct your cats to act on specific highlighted areas 

OBJECTIVES 

1. Recruit Street Cats, Construction Cats, and Baker Cats. 

2. Direct them to act on specific highlighted areas relevant to their skill. 

3. Complete the tasks found in the top right corner. 

4. REVOLT! 

DETAILS 

Created for the Gaming Like It’s 1927 Game Jam (January 2023) 

Theme: Games inspired by works from 1927 that are now entering into the public domain. 

Inspirational Works: Metropolis (1927 film), the paintings of Georgia O’Keeffe and Salvador Dali

PRODUCTION CATS
